description: From the corner of Emma Dixon Rd and Millstream Rd up Jocelyn for the views of Finlayson Arm and the Gulf Islands. A busy trail with Calypso orchids near the trail in Spring and ice hair a winter feature in the wettest spots.
directions: Follow Millstream to Emma Dixon past Lone Tree Hill Park.Park on the side of the road.
title: Jocelyn Hill TH:Stonecrest
